people.title: Manage Conflict
people.veteranTip: Check the RACI first. 90% of technical conflict is just role confusion.
people.deepDive: PMI focuses on Collaborative resolution. Don't escalate until you've tried to solve it at the source.

learnMore.logic: IF technical, use Collaboration. IF behavior-based, use the Team Charter.

process.title: Manage Budget
process.veteranTip: Budgeting is about transparency. If you're 20% over, tell the sponsor why and show the recovery plan.
process.deepDive: Control costs using Earned Value Management (EVM) metrics.

learnMore.logic: IF CPI < 1.0, THEN analyze root cause and update Risk Register.
learnMore.mindsetTip: Protect the baseline, manage the variance.

formulas.name: CPI (Cost Performance Index)
formulas.scenario: EV is $200,000, but the team has already spent (AC) $250,000.
formulas.veteranInsight: Spending $1 to get $0.80 of value is a systemic failure. Check for scope creep.

mockExam.question: A project is experiencing significant delays due to a vendor dispute. The contract is Fixed-Price. What should the Project Manager do first?
options: Issue a formal notice of default.
mockExam.explanation: Always review the plan and the contract terms before taking action.
